response.original_title: Тайны дворцовых переворотов. Россия, век XVIII-ый. Фильм 7-й. Виват, Анна! II
response.overview: Europe and Russia are shocked by the unexpected death of the young Emperor Peter II. He died at the age of 14, leaving behind neither an heir nor a will. Who will get the crown of the Russian Empire? A fierce struggle for power begins. Having chosen Anna Ioannovna, the Privy Council hoped to use her as a puppet and a screen for the implementation of their own selfish plans. But the nobles were mistaken - the people do not like eight tyrants. Let there be a tyrant, but only ONE!
response.title: Secrets of Palace coup d'etat. Russia, 18th century. Film №7. Viva, Anna! II

titles.title: Тайны дворцовых переворотов. Россия, век XVIII. Фильм 7. Виват, Анна Иоанновна! II
